Document Sources.Sourced Statement: In Niobrara County, Wyoming, the least-populated county in the least-populated state, Becky Blackburn is one of just 32 left.
Document Sources.Source Justification: according to Associated Press election data

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Nationwide, Democrats account for fewer than 3% of voters in three counties this year, up from one county in 2020 but down from seven in 2016.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: "Normally I just roll my eyes and walk away because I’m fighting a losing battle and I’m fully aware of that," she said. "Maybe that is why I’m well-liked, because I keep my mouth shut 10 times more than I want to."
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: A paralegal for the Republican county attorney, Blackburn hears a lot of right-wing views around town.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: "I won two elections here. Even though that’s nonpartisan, people still knew I had left-leaning values," she said.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: "You feel skeevy and dirty when you do it. But you do it anyway and you change it back as soon as you can, because you don’t want to start getting the Republican mailings," Blackburn said.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: "How far are they going to go to limit one’s ability to vote? Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Diercks was a Republican before deciding the GOP didn’t do enough to support public education.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: "The best way to participate in meaningful change is to try to sway the dominant party," said Jordan, who lives in Niobrara County. "You know, we need to have a government that serves the people, all of them, not just Republicans and not just rural and not just urban and not just Democrats — and definitely not just the rich and the wealthy."
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Jordan supports many left-leaning goals, including universal healthcare, but said he only registers as a Republican.
